tagline: Bihar mein future ko shaktishaali banaate hain
welcome: Class 1 se 10 ke liye mazedaar, inspiring platform!
thankYou: Humein Contact Karne Ke Liye Dhanyavaad!
adminFeature: Study Materials upload karein, students ko manage karein, quiz questions add karein, etc.
funActivitiesDesc: Quizzes, MCQ aur games jo padhai ko mazedaar banayein.
practiceLabDesc: Interactive quizzes karein, badges paayein aur apna score dekhein!
biharPrideDesc: Bihar ke legends, culture aur achievements jaanein!
dashboardGreeting: Dashboard par swagat hai! Apni journey track karo aur roz kuchh naya sikho.
name: Naam
contactInfoDesc: Humein aapki baatein sunna pasand hai! Prashn ya feedback ke liye contact karein.
sportsDesc: Holistic growth ke liye sports aur mentorship activities.
mentorTagline: Hum aapko best mentor aur career experts se jodte hain.
mentorIntro: Hamara platform students ko 1-on-1 mentorship aur personalized career guidance deta hai, jisse future ki tayyari aasan ho jaati hai.
mentorshipDesc: Experienced mentors se personal guidance paayein. Sessions book karein aur apni potential unlock karein!
guidanceDesc: Careers explore karein, expert advice paayein, apni safalta ki raah chunin.
personalMentor: Har student ke liye personal mentor
subjectMentors: School subjects aur olympiad ke mentors
examPrep: Competitive exams ki tayyari mein madad
sportsJoined: Aap sports mein enroll ho gaye hain!
mentorshipHow: Hamara mentorship program interactive hai, personal hai, aur confidence aur skills build karne mein proven hai.
joinMentorshipDesc: Kya aap ready ho grow karne ke liye? Hamara mentorship program join karein aur dedicated support & learning ke zariye apni potential unlock karo.
sportsHow: Hamara sports program world-class coaching aur mazedar competition laata hai, taaki har student apni strengths khoje aur active rehna pasand kare.
joinSportsDesc: Chalo active ho jao! Sports enrichment mein join karo‚Äîcoaches, friends, aur fun aapke liye.

legends.name: Dr. Rajendra Prasad
legends.desc: Bharat ke pehle Rashtrapati, freedom struggle ke leader, aur unki simplicity aur leadership ke liye jane jate hain.

legends.name: Aryabhatta
legends.desc: Mashhoor ganitgyani aur Jyotishacharya, Aryabhatiya kitab aur zero/trigonometry mein yogdan ke liye famous.

legends.name: Shehnai Maestro Bismillah Khan
legends.desc: Duniya bhar ke shehnai vadak, jinhone Bihar ki classical music ko international bana diya.

facts.title: Location
facts.desc: Bihar Purvi India mein hai, bahut si nadiyon aur upjaau maidaan ke saath.

facts.title: Krishi
facts.desc: Chawal, gehun, dal, ganna ‚Äî Bihar laakhon logon ko khilata hai.

facts.title: Shiksha
facts.desc: Nalanda aur Vikramshila duniya ke famous purane vishwa-vidyalay the.

facts.title: Sanskriti
facts.desc: Chhath Puja, Sonepur Mela, aur anya teharon mein Bihar ka friendly nature dikhta hai.

facts.title: Itihas
facts.desc: Buddha, Mahavir, Ashok ki bhoomi‚ÄîBihar ne dharm aur history ko shape diya.

facts.title: Khana
facts.desc: Litti Chokha, Sattu Paratha, Thekua‚ÄîBihar ke yummy khaane.

sportsEnrollDesc: Sports coaching, fitness events, aur zyada ke liye sign up karein.
careerEnrollDesc: Personal guidance se apni journey shuru karein.
